summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from April 2021 between an individual identifying as a New York State Public Notary and the legal visit scheduling department (BRO-LegalVisit-S) at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) Brooklyn. The notary is attempting to schedule a 'legal visit' with inmate Ghislaine Maxwell but is denied because the facility is only allowing attorney visits. The notary argues that notaries have the power to execute legal contracts and demands Maxwell's right to additional legal counsel.

persons.name: Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell
persons.context: The individual the notary is attempting to visit at MDC Brooklyn. Referenced by her full name and inmate register number (02879-509).

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in several emails by the notary as the person they wish to visit. Appears to be the same person as Ghislaine Noelle Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghilaine Maxwell
persons.context: A misspelling of Ghislaine Maxwell's name used in the initial email from the notary.

connections.description: Different name variations used for the same individual, the inmate at MDC Brooklyn.

events.title: Notary's Initial Visit Request
events.description: An individual, identifying as a New York State Public Notary, initially requests a legal visit with Ghislaine Maxwell at 8:00 AM at MDC Brooklyn.

events.title: Visit Request Denied
events.description: The MDC Brooklyn Legal Department denies the notary's visit request, stating the facility is only allowing attorney visits to meet with clients.

events.title: Rescheduled Visit Request
events.description: After the denial, the notary reschedules the requested visit to May 2, 2021, at 8:00 AM.

keyFacts: In April 2021, MDC Brooklyn had a policy restricting inmate visits to attorneys only, denying access to notaries public.

An individual claiming to be a New York State Public Notary aggressively attempted to visit Ghislaine Maxwell, arguing that notaries have the power to execute legal contracts and that Maxwell had a right to additional legal counsel.
Ghislaine Maxwell was an inmate at MDC Brooklyn under register number 02879-509 in late April/early May 2021.
The correspondence reveals a procedural conflict between a notary's claimed legal functions and the detention center's visitation rules.
The notary's communications are persistent and argumentative, demanding Maxwell's rights be honored.
